Key Match Events: Alperen Sengun collected 32 points, 14 rebounds and five assists to lead the Houston Rockets past the Memphis Grizzlies 119-115
Ja Morant paced the Grizzlies with 27 points
Santi Aldama returned to action after a brief injury-induced absence and finished with 12 points and nine rebounds
The Grizzlies trailed by 10 early in the fourth quarter, but scrapped back to cut the deficit to 115-114 with 2:49 to go
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Grizzlies and Rockets, who have the second- and third-most wins in the Western Conference teams behind Oklahoma City, met in the first of three games against each another this month
The Rockets moved 1 1/2 games ahead of the Grizzlies
Others: Desmond Bane also returned after missing Monday’s win over Dallas with an ankle injury and scored 16 points
Former Grizzlies’ big man Steven Adams had seven rebounds in the half
